Text

﻿Legacy of the Lost Link to This Week 's Reading _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

“ [You]4014-you Are Only Defeated Once [You]4014-you Surrender [Your]4014-you Hope . ”[31-sibier] -Trent “ [You]4014-you ’ve Never Known How Much Hope Can Hurt . ”[31-sibier] -High Executioner

The Conqueror Chapter One

[Trent]31-sibier [ b]knocked th[c]e [King Icar]32-icar ’s blade out of [his]31-sibier hands . [His]31-sibier chest heaved as [he]31-sibier raised [his]31-sibier sword , the tip quivering just inches from [Icar]32-icar ’s throat . A slow , bitter smile tugged at the corners of [Trent]31-sibier 's lips , the taste of iron sharp in [his]31-sibier mouth — a reminder of the necessary brutality that had brought [him]31-sibier to this moment . [Trent]31-sibier had finally won . The air was thick with sweat as [Trent]31-sibier felt the weight of [an entire kingdom]178-an entire kingdom ’s suffering lift off [his]31-sibier shoulders . This rebellion — this final battle — was the culmination of sacrifice , tears and grit , fueled by [a broken people]179-a broken people . [The kingdom]180-the kingdom 's hunger , the wails of [orphaned children]181-orphaned children , the terror of the Trials … all of it would end with the pulse trembling under the point of [his]31-sibier sword . “ It ’s over , ”[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier growled , [his]31-sibier voice low , rough like stone grinding against steel . [His]31-sibier grip tightened on the hilt of [his]31-sibier sword , and the blade inched closer to [Icar]32-icar ’s throat , just enough to draw the first pinprick of blood . But [Icar]32-icar — gaunt , pale , with eyes sunken into [his]32-icar skull — didn’t flinch . [He]32-icar did n’t beg . [He]32-icar did n’t even look afraid . Instead , [his]32-icar thin lips curled into something that might have been a smile , or maybe something even darker . [His]32-icar calm , almost amused gaze sent a chill rippling through [Trent]31-sibier 's veins . Why was [he]32-icar smiling ? [Trent]31-sibier 's pulse quickened . [His]31-sibier instincts screamed at [him]31-sibier that something was wrong , but [he]31-sibier could n’t let it show . Not now . [He]31-sibier was [the rebellion leader]182-the rebellion leader , [the man who had risen from nothing to topple [a tyrant]184-a tyrant]183-the man who had risen from nothing to topple a tyrant . [He]31-sibier had led [hundreds]185-hundreds to [their]185-hundreds deaths for this moment . [He]31-sibier had sworn to see [the king]186-the king dead . [He]31-sibier had to see [the king]186-the king dead . [Skies]33-skies , [I]0-i should be [the one smiling]188-the one smiling ! [Trent]31-sibier dug the blade a fraction deeper , a thin line of blood dripping down [Icar]32-icar ’s throat . “ Is that it ? ”[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier roared , shaking . “ [You]32-icar have nothing to say ? No last words , no plea for mercy ? ”[31-sibier] [His]31-sibier hand trembled , despite [himself]31-sibier . But [King Icar]32-icar 's smile only grew . Slowly , as if savoring each word , [he]32-icar wrapped [his]32-icar bony fingers around the edge of [Trent]31-sibier ’s sword and pulled it closer to [his]32-icar chest , the blade cutting into [his]32-icar own skin . [His]32-icar eyes never left [Trent]31-sibier ’s . “ [My]32-icar life does n’t end here , [Trent]31-sibier , ”[32-icar] [he]32-icar said , [his]32-icar voice steady , cold . “ [You]31-sibier and [I]32-icar both know that . The stars have a far greater destiny for [me]32-icar . ”[32-icar] A shudder chilled [Trent]31-sibier 's spine . [He]31-sibier could feel [Icar]32-icar ’s eyes digging into [him]31-sibier , searching for something deep inside , but [he]31-sibier did n’t dare let [his]31-sibier blade waver . “ [You]31-sibier ’re [a liar]4015-a liar , ”[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier spat . “ And [you]31-sibier ’re naive , [Trent]31-sibier , ”[186-the king] [the King]186-the king continued , [his]186-the king voice low and dangerous . “ [You]31-sibier know barely anything . [You]31-sibier ’re more concerned about a few lives than the course of history itself . The suffering [you]31-sibier ’re so eager to end — it 's nothing compared to what ’s coming . ”[186-the king] [Trent]31-sibier ’s knuckles whitened around the hilt of [his]31-sibier sword . [He]31-sibier was n’t going to let [the king]186-the king play mind games , not now . Not when [they]191-they were this close to victory . “ [You]186-the king do n’t know what [you]186-the king ’re talking about , ”[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier hissed . [Icar]32-icar ’s lips twitched into a smirk , [his]32-icar eyes gleaming with something like pity . “ [I]32-icar know far more than [you]31-sibier , ”[32-icar] [he]32-icar said softly . “ And [I]32-icar know this : with [me]32-icar , [Trent]31-sibier , [you]31-sibier could save not just a few lives , but [you]31-sibier could save [the kingdom]180-the kingdom . ”[32-icar] Clenching [his]31-sibier teeth , [Trent]31-sibier took a step closer , masking the gnawing fear inside . “ [I]31-sibier ’ll save [the kingdom]180-the kingdom by killing [you]31-sibier . ”[31-sibier] [King Icar]32-icar leaned in , [his]32-icar voice dipping into a whisper that chilled [Trent]31-sibier to [his]31-sibier core . " And let [[your]31-sibier family]4018-your family [ [d]die]1-d]die ? ”[32-icar] The words hit [him]31-sibier like a hammer . [Trent]31-sibier ’s heart stopped . [He]31-sibier tried to keep the fear from [his]31-sibier face , but [Icar]32-icar ’s eyes were sharp . [They]192-they saw everything . Heavens above . The tip of [Trent]31-sibier 's sword quivered inches from [the king]186-the king 's chest , mirroring the tremors of doubt that shuddered through [him]31-sibier . [His]31-sibier grip tightened around the hilt , cracking [his]31-sibier dry skin . How could [he]186-the king have reached [[my]0-i family]194-my family ? For a moment , [Trent]31-sibier closed [his]31-sibier eyes , trying to block out the fear . [He]31-sibier could almost see [[his]31-sibier family]195-his family , hearing [their]195-his family voices as if [they]195-his family were right in front of [him]31-sibier . [[His]31-sibier mother]196-his mother ’s strong scent of olive oil when [he]31-sibier embraced [her]196-his mother goodbye . [Sasha]34-sibier , [[his]31-sibier oldest sister]197-his oldest sister , with [her]197-his oldest sister steady smile and reassuring voice as [she]197-his oldest sister ruffled [his]31-sibier hair before [he]31-sibier left for this final mission . And [Selean]35-selean — [[his]31-sibier youngest sister]198-his youngest sister — fiery , rebellious [Selean]35-selean , pumping [her]35-selean fist in the air , practically begging [him]31-sibier to take [her]35-selean along . [He]31-sibier had laughed it off , telling [her]35-selean that [they]199-them were safer in [[the rebellion]200-the rebellion base where [the king]186-the king could never find [them]199-them]201-the rebellion base where the king could never find them … [Trent]31-sibier felt as though [he]31-sibier had been suckerpunched . [Trent]31-sibier swallowed hard , shaking [his]31-sibier head as if to physically throw off the doubt . [He]31-sibier had been so careful , had n’t [he]31-sibier ? [He]31-sibier had hidden [them]199-them , secured [them]199-them . [They]199-them were supposed to be safe . But [Icar]32-icar ’s calm , [his]32-icar eerie confidence — it gnawed at [Trent]31-sibier ’s resolve , twisted it , made [him]31-sibier question everything [he]31-sibier thought [he]31-sibier knew . How could [the king]186-the king be so blasted sure ? Behind [him]31-sibier , the clang of steel and muffled cries echoed off the stone walls . [Karia]36-karia . [She]36-karia was still fighting , a whirlwind of motion and fire , [her]36-karia auburn hair wild and streaked with blood as [she]36-karia wrenched [her]36-karia dagger from [a fallen guard]204-a fallen guard ’s throat . [Her]36-karia eyes , fierce and alive , darted around for any remaining threats . " Hurry , [Trent]31-sibier . "[36-karia] [Karia]36-karia ’s voice cut through the fog in [his]31-sibier mind like a blade , sharp and urgent . " Finish it . "[36-karia] But [Trent]31-sibier ’s hands shook . [He]31-sibier could feel the sword ’s weight in [his]31-sibier grip , could see its gleaming edge , but it no longer felt like a weapon of justice . It felt like a burden — heavy , mocking — its point pressed against the throat of [a man who had somehow turned everything upside down in a matter of minutes]205-a man who had somehow turned everything upside down in a matter of minutes . [[His]31-sibier family]195-his family weighed heavily on [his]31-sibier mind . Could [I]0-i sacrifice [them]195-his family ? [Trent]31-sibier had dreamed of this moment , prayed for it , bled for it . For years , [he]31-sibier and [Karia]36-karia had built this rebellion , imagining the day when [they]195-his family would finally bring down [the tyrant king]207-the tyrant king . Yet now , with the moment at hand , [Trent]31-sibier felt paralyzed . Was it all worth it ? Had [they]195-his family done any of it right ? Rage bubbled beneath the surface , mingling with [his]31-sibier terror . [He]31-sibier hated [Icar]32-icar — hated [him]32-icar for the hunger , the fear , the endless Trials that had torn [families]208-families apart . But now [he]31-sibier was terrified too — terrified that [Icar]32-icar was n’t bluffing . That with one fatal mistake , [he]31-sibier might condemn [[his]31-sibier own family]209-his own family to the very suffering [he]31-sibier had fought so hard to escape . " Prove it , "[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier demanded , [his]31-sibier voice barely more than a whisper , cracked and raw . [His]31-sibier arms shook with the effort to stay [his]31-sibier hand , every muscle tight , every nerve screaming for release . But [Icar]32-icar , with the serenity of a serpent coiled and ready to strike , only smiled wider , saying nothing . [Trent]31-sibier snapped . With a savage thrust , [he]31-sibier drove [his]31-sibier knee into [Icar]32-icar ’s stomach . [The fragile king]210-the fragile king bent forwards gasping , [his]210-the fragile king skeletal frame folding under the force . Before [Icar]32-icar could catch [his]32-icar breath , [Trent]31-sibier backhanded [him]32-icar , sending [the king]186-the king ’s head whipping to the side . “ PROVE IT ! ”[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier screamed , [his]31-sibier voice hoarse with fury , [his]31-sibier chest heaving with wild , frantic breaths . [His]32-icar hands twitched , trembling as though they could barely contain [his]32-icar need to rip [Icar]32-icar apart . But even beaten and sprawled on the cold stone floor , [the king]186-the king ’s eerie grin remained . “ [[Your]31-sibier family]4018-your family … ”[32-icar] [Icar]32-icar rasped , blood flecking [his]32-icar lips . “ [They]4018-your family were collected as tribute for the Trials . ”[32-icar] [His]32-icar voice was strained , but there was a twisted satisfaction behind [his]32-icar words , every syllable dripping with cruelty . “ [I]31-sibier still remember how [[your]31-sibier sister]4020-your sister [Selean]35-selean kicked and screamed . [Her]35-selean spark of hope is … resilient . [She]35-selean might go far before [she]35-selean dies . ”[31-sibier] [Trent]31-sibier froze , [his]31-sibier world tilting on its axis . “ No , ”[31-sibier] [he]31-sibier whispered , [his]31-sibier voice breaking , barely audible over the hammering of [his]31-sibier heart . “ No … how ? ”[31-sibier] [His]31-sibier mind reeled , stumbling over itself . [He]31-sibier could n’t believe it , did n’t want to believe it , but [his]31-sibier gut twisted as though it was the truth . “ There is n’t much time before the Trial begins , ”[213-the tyrant] [the tyrant]213-the tyrant continued , wiping blood from [his]213-the tyrant chin . “ [I]213-the tyrant already started the process . ”[213-the tyrant] [Trent]31-sibier ’s grip loosened on [his]31-sibier sword . [His]31-sibier hand fell , limp and useless , and the weapon clattered to the floor with a metallic crash . The weight of [Icar]32-icar ’s words settled over [Trent]31-sibier , crushing [him]31-sibier under its brutal reality . [His]31-sibier legs buckled , the strength sapped from [his]31-sibier body . “ No … ”[31-sibier] [he]31-sibier muttered , shaking [his]31-sibier head like [a man]214-a man drowning , trying to surface for air . “ No , no , no ! ”[31-sibier] [His]31-sibier mind unraveled , memories flooding in , relentless and agonizing . [He]31-sibier remembered the nights spent planning with [Karia]36-karia , both of [them]215-them shivering under threadbare blankets , clinging to hope . [He]31-sibier remembered [passing [orphaned children]181-orphaned children on [the streets]218-the streets]216-passing orphaned children on the streets , flicking [them]181-orphaned children a coin with a wink that promised salvation . [He]31-sibier remembered [[his]31-sibier friend]219-his friend ’s dying breath on the battlefield , the life draining from [his]219-his friend eyes as [Trent]31-sibier held [him]219-his friend , helpless . Was it all for nothing ? The thought tore through [him]31-sibier like a jagged blade . Was this all for naught ? The price … [[his]31-sibier family]195-his family … [I]0-i ca n’t … Then the images shifted : [[his]31-sibier mother]196-his mother ’s tear - streaked face as [she]196-his mother clung to [him]31-sibier , grieving the loss of [[his]31-sibier brother]222-his brother , dead from cholera . [He]31-sibier had begged [[the king]186-the king ’s doctors]224-the king ’s doctors for medicine , but [he]31-sibier had only gotten spit . That day [he]31-sibier had sworn to tear [the monarchy]225-the monarchy apart piece by bloody piece , to avenge every slight , every loss . Everything [Trent]31-sibier had ever done was for [[his]31-sibier family]195-his family . Everything . And now ? Now [they]195-his family were [the ones paying the price]227-the ones paying the price . Something inside [him]31-sibier broke free , a wild , seething fury rising like molten lava . [Trent]31-sibier ’s entire body trembled , [his]31-sibier fists clenching so tight [his]31-sibier nails dug into [his]31-sibier palms . [His]31-sibier vision blurred , red creeping in at the edges . Only [I]32-icar know where the Trials are . ”[32-icar] [Trent]31-sibier stopped mid - lunge , [his]31-sibier fists hovering in the air . Even [her]36-karia resilience , which had always been unshakable , now appeared fragile . [Her]36-karia eyes — wild with fear — darted to [Trent]31-sibier , pleading without words . [Trent]31-sibier ’s stomach churned violently , nausea rising in [his]31-sibier throat . Reduced to Legacy Chapter Two

[Icar]32-icar had backed [him]31-sibier into a corner . “ What would [you]32-icar have [me]31-sibier do ? ”[31-sibier] [he]31-sibier whispered , defeated . “ Since [you]31-sibier murdered [[my]32-icar High Executioner]4094-my high executioner , a position has unexpectedly opened , ”[32-icar] [Icar]32-icar said , [his]32-icar grin wide and unsettling . “ [You]31-sibier will take [his]4094-my high executioner place . ”[32-icar] [Trent]31-sibier felt as if the ground had vanished beneath [him]31-sibier . This is not peace . [Trent]31-sibier shivered , remembering how [the High Executioner]42-the high executioner had licked [his]31-sibier lips as [they]387-they fought . [Trent]31-sibier swallowed , feeling the weight of [his]31-sibier decision . [He]31-sibier was cornered , bound by [his]31-sibier vow to safeguard [[his]31-sibier family]195-his family . Hide in the darkness , [Trent[f]43-trent[f ] whispered to [himself]43-trent[f . The hood of [Trent]31-sibier ’s cloak provided a meager refuge from prying eyes . "[31-sibier] Those words echoed harrowingly in [his]31-sibier soul . Each step served as a painful reminder of [his]31-sibier physical and emotional scars . Some of [them]399-the alleyways , pushed to lunacy by hunger , even dared to reach over [the cliffs of [the island]402-the island]401-the cliffs of the island , hoping to harvest moss to eat . [He]31-sibier squinted , but the pain was a mere echo compared to the turmoil that roiled in [his]31-sibier heart – a heart torn between duty and despair , yearning for redemption in a world that believed [him]31-sibier dead . [Trent]31-sibier had failed [this kingdom]4075-this kingdom . [He]31-sibier had failed [these people]409-these people . [He]31-sibier closed [his]31-sibier eyes , muttering , as [he]31-sibier prayed to the skies . [The High Executioner]384-the high executioner turned to face [[his]31-sibier parents]503-his parents , blade in hand . Then [Sibier]31-sibier slipped out into the storm . Never again looking back . _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Out of [the Ashes Chapter Four

[Trent]31-sibier glanced over [his]31-sibier shoulder , [his]31-sibier heart pounding with urgency — [he]31-sibier only had a few minutes before [he]31-sibier had to face [King Icar]32-icar in [their]697-their upcoming meeting . [The prison chambers]698-the prison chambers , cold and suffocating , echoed with a haunting chill : [he]31-sibier could never forget the moment [he]31-sibier was forced to become [the High Executioner]384-the high executioner . Each visible puff of [his]31-sibier breath in the frigid air was a stark reminder of how far [he]31-sibier had fallen . The Legacy of The Cursed Child Chapter Seven

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Cursed Chapter Twelve

The headache was unbearable . [Sibier]31-sibier squinted [his]31-sibier eyes , as colors blurred around [him]31-sibier . [He]31-sibier sat hunched on cold stone , the wind 's mournful howls mingling with the sporadic crackle of lightning overhead . Hunting [the Past Chapter Fifteen

Dressed in all black]1243-the past chapter fifteen dressed in all black , [Sibier]34-sibier crept across [the rooftop]1244-the rooftop towards [the captain]560-the captain ’s , every step calculated and every breath measured . Despite [Werrin]56-werrin ’s agreement to help , [Karia]36-karia had remained wary of [the captain]560-the captain ’s motives , digging into [his]560-the captain past with relentless precision . After all , [Sibier]34-sibier had already been deceived once by [the man]466-the man — [he]34-sibier could n’t afford to be blindsided again . As [he]34-sibier slipped off the roof , landing with a muted thud behind [[Werrin]56-werrin ’s modest house]1248-werrin ’s modest house , [Sibier]34-sibier ’s mind replayed [Karia]36-karia ’s findings . [Werrin]56-werrin had come from humble beginnings , forced to join [[the King]186-the king ’s forces]536-the king ’s forces at fifteen to support [[his]56-werrin family]195-his family after [their]195-his family business ’s failure . [His]56-werrin rise through the ranks had been swift and marked by an undeniable cunning — most notably at the Battle of [the Ash]15-the ash , where [[Sibier]34-sibier ’s father]1252-sibier ’s father had faced [his]1252-sibier ’s father ultimate defeat . Afterwards , [he]56-werrin was soon named [captain of [the 7th district]745-the 7th district]1253-captain of the 7th district , and became someone [[his]56-werrin fellow soldiers]1255-his fellow soldiers respected but feared . But amidst all the wariness , one detail had made [Sibier]34-sibier ’s heart stir with hope : [Werrin]56-werrin harbored a deep , personal vendetta against the Darkened Dawn . [Sibier]34-sibier needed [Werrin]56-werrin ’s help , but this time [he]34-sibier was n’t stupid enough to go in blind . Silent on [his]34-sibier toes , [Sibier]34-sibier reached the window - sill to [[Werrin]56-werrin ’s home]1256-werrin ’s home , ducking behind a nearby barrel as [a patrol]1257-a patrol passed by . Breathing out carefully , [he]34-sibier peered through . Dusk had settled , but enough light lingered to reveal [the room inside]1258-the room inside — a modest space centered around a well - worn oak table . [Captain Werrin]56-werrin crouched beside [two young girls]1259-two young girls , speaking to [them]1259-two young girls in a low , soothing tone . On the other side of [the room]334-the room stood [a woman with long dark hair]1261-a woman with long dark hair , [her]1261-a woman with long dark hair arms folded as [she]1261-a woman with long dark hair watched the scene with a soft smile . As [he]34-sibier observed [them]1259-two young girls , a strange warmth blossomed in [his]34-sibier chest . It was a sensation [he]34-sibier did n’t know quite how to explain — maybe trust , or perhaps even longing . [His]34-sibier thoughts lingered back to [[his]34-sibier mother]196-his mother , who would have been easily able to describe the emotion with some verse from scripture . [She]196-his mother might have even called it the sense , urging [him]34-sibier to do good … [Sibier]34-sibier shook [his]34-sibier head . [He]34-sibier had never been good at recognizing what was the sense , and [he]34-sibier did n’t dare say it came from the heaven ’s without [[his]34-sibier mother]196-his mother ’s approval . [Sibier]34-sibier felt [his]34-sibier eyes begin to water . [He]34-sibier missed [her]196-his mother . [She]196-his mother would have been able to discern [Werrin]56-werrin ’s character in an instant , and tell [him]34-sibier whether or not to trust [him]34-sibier . And now alone , [Sibier]34-sibier did n't know which [he]34-sibier should do . [He]34-sibier just felt , well , like [he]34-sibier could trust [the captain]560-the captain . [Werrin]56-werrin reached into [his]56-werrin pocket , producing two small fish . [The girls]1265-the girls ’ eyes lit up as [they]1265-the girls snatched [them]1265-the girls from [him]34-sibier , looking at the fish with mouths agape with awe . Then , [they]1265-the girls pounced , wrapping [their]1265-the girls arms around [[their]1265-the girls father]1266-their father in a bearish hug . [Sibier]34-sibier could hear [his]34-sibier muffled laughter through the glass , a sound so genuine that it tugged at something deep within [him]34-sibier . Once again , [he]34-sibier yearned to have [[his]34-sibier own mother]493-his own mother by [his]34-sibier side . [He]56-werrin opened it to reveal only a handful of mashed grain , which [[his]56-werrin wife]1269-his wife eyed with a mix of relief and sorrow . [She]1269-his wife stepped closer , resting a hand on [Werrin]56-werrin ’s shoulder , rubbing [his]56-werrin back in a gesture that spoke of shared burdens and unspoken worries . [The girls]1265-the girls snatched the box eagerly , oblivious to the weight [[their]1265-the girls parents]1271-their parents bore . [Sibier]34-sibier felt [his]34-sibier throat tighten , [his]34-sibier eyes stinging with unshed tears . This — this simple , humble scene — was the embodiment of what [[his]34-sibier parents]503-his parents had envisioned . [A world where [families]208-families could thrive , where the bonds of love and sacrifice were not torn apart by the cruelty of [the kingdom]180-the kingdom]1273-a world where families could thrive , where the bonds of love and sacrifice were not torn apart by the cruelty of the kingdom . [He]56-werrin was someone who already lived the dream . [She]36-karia nodded , as together [they]1288-they slipped away into the night . But as [Sibier]34-sibier moved through the darkness , [his]34-sibier thoughts lingered on [the family [he]34-sibier had just seen]1289-the family he had just seen . For the first time in what felt like ages , [he]34-sibier felt a spark of hope — fragile and fleeting , but enough to remind [him]34-sibier of why [he]34-sibier fought . And [Sibier]34-sibier would stop at nothing to make it a reality . It was the legacy [[his]34-sibier parents]503-his parents left behind .

⧫ ⧫ ⧫

[Sibier]34-sibier crept through the towering stalks of corn , [his]34-sibier eyes sharp and ears alert . Ahead , [Karia]36-karia and [Werrin]56-werrin hid behind weathered stones , [their]1288-they forms barely visible in [the moonlit field]1293-the moonlit field . [Sibier]34-sibier ’s knapsack already bulged with a few ears of corn — small trophies [he]34-sibier hoped to bring back to [Ilyian]46-ilyian . [He]34-sibier could n’t remember if [[his]34-sibier younger brother]499-his younger brother had ever eaten the stuff before . The thought made [his]34-sibier chest tighten with both longing and guilt . As [he]34-sibier stepped through the stalks , [Sibier]34-sibier could n’t help but consider the significance of [this field]1295-this field . This much corn could feed [hundreds]185-hundreds , yet it remained a secret from [most of [the kingdom]180-the kingdom]1297-most of the kingdom — hidden , protected , and fiercely guarded by [the Darkened Dawn]41-the darkened dawn . It was a secret [[his]34-sibier father]275-his father had shared with [him]34-sibier in stories , a treasure that could change lives if only [they]1300-they could wrest it from [the syndicate]1301-the syndicate 's grip . [His]34-sibier breath stilled as [two members of the Darkened Dawn]1302-two members of the darkened dawn approached , [their]1302-two members of the darkened dawn movements unnervingly smooth , almost gliding across [the earth]1303-the earth . [Their]1302-two members of the darkened dawn robes , though simpler than those worn by the figures [he]34-sibier ’d seen before , still sent a chill down [his]34-sibier spine . There was something about [them]1302-two members of the darkened dawn — something that made [his]34-sibier skin crawl . Unconsciously , [he]34-sibier rubbed [his]34-sibier cursed arm , feeling the familiar , unsettling tingle beneath [his]34-sibier skin . [Sibier]34-sibier closed [his]34-sibier eyes briefly , drawing in a deep breath to steady [himself]34-sibier . Neither [Karia]36-karia nor [Werrin]56-werrin had known about [this place]1304-this place , and it had been [Sibier]34-sibier who had suggested this plan , drawing on the memories of [[his]34-sibier father]275-his father ’s stories . [[His]34-sibier father]275-his father had once drawn out plans to raid [this field]1295-this field and take the corn to feed [the people]4030-the people — now , that burden rested on [Sibier]34-sibier ’s shoulders . Yet despite all that , standing here in the dark and about to ambush [two members of the Darkened Dawn]1302-two members of the darkened dawn made [his]34-sibier throat dry up and resolve waver . [The Darkened Dawn members]1310-the darkened dawn members drew closer , [their]1310-the darkened dawn members steps eerily silent . [They]1310-the darkened dawn members passed by [Karia]36-karia and [Werrin]56-werrin , who were crouched low , swords drawn , muscles coiled like springs . [Sibier]34-sibier ’s heart pounded in [his]34-sibier chest , [his]34-sibier hand instinctively tightening around the hilt of [his]34-sibier sword . Then , almost uncanningly , [the Darkened Dawn]984-the darkened dawn halted , glancing down at a vial linked around [their]1302-two members of the darkened dawn belt — the same one [Sibier]34-sibier had seen nights earlier . Yet this time the contents swirled together into a dark form [Sibier]34-sibier could n’t quite make out , similar to how the mist rolled together during the trials . It froze [Sibier]34-sibier ’s blood , as [he]34-sibier opened [his]34-sibier mouth to warn [[his]34-sibier friends]278-his friends . But no words came out . And then , in a blur of motion , [Karia]36-karia and [Werrin]56-werrin struck . The flames licked at the body , their final , consuming embrace obscuring [the man]466-the man ’s figure as it was swallowed whole by the inferno . Cold inside , [Sibier]34-sibier sniffed as [he]34-sibier stood there , watching it all burn . The fire was destroying what little hope [the cornfield]1399-the cornfield represented . Skies , this much food could save [the kingdom]180-the kingdom — feed [families]208-families , keep [[children]822-children like [Ilyian]46-ilyian]1403-children like ilyian from starving . But [he]34-sibier remained motionless , numb , as [the person [he]34-sibier had killed]1404-the person he had killed disappeared into the blaze . Blinking , [he]34-sibier ripped [his]34-sibier gaze away from the fire , turning to [Werrin]56-werrin . “ [We]56-werrin have to stop the flames . _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ The Birth of a Tyrant Chapter Sixteen

There was no trace of a smile on [Trent]31-sibier ’s face . The chill of the caverns seeped into [his]31-sibier bones , as [he]31-sibier stepped on jagged shards of broken glass . The Trial control board spanned out in front of [him]31-sibier , and every few seconds it sparked , as if begging not to be used again . However , the busted controls had been patched up , the shattered glass pieced together with visible gaps — cracks that mirrored the brokenness of [the room]334-the room , of the process , of [the very man who stood before [it]334-the room]1410-the very man who stood before it . [The chamber]4176-the chamber was in ruins , unfit for running trials safely , but to the depths with it all . Safety was n’t a concern for [him]31-sibier . It never had been . Because heavens above , [he]31-sibier was [the High Executioner]384-the high executioner . [The man[ap][aq ] [he]31-sibier dragged]1413-the man[ap][aq ] he dragged with [him]31-sibier was barely conscious , [his]31-sibier resistance long since given up . [His]31-sibier hand kept pushing until the throttle snapped free from the control board , leaving [him]31-sibier holding the broken handle . There was no stopping the Trials now . For a brief moment , it felt like time had stopped , and [Sibier]31-sibier ’s mind raced with a thousand thoughts . Heaven above , help [her]36-karia . [Skies]33-skies , help [me]0-i too ! Then , all at once , the silence shattered . [Werrin]56-werrin was beside [him]31-sibier , unflinching , [his]56-werrin eyes unfocused — just like the night [he]56-werrin stood in front of [the burning field]1738-the burning field as the flames glistened in [his]56-werrin eyes . * * [ bh ] Section Break * *

[Trent]31-sibier brushed aside the thick foliage as [[his]31-sibier men]1746-his men trudged through [the mountains]1542-the mountains . The sound of [their]1746-his men boots crunching over rocks and dry earth was rhythmic , familiar — yet unsettling . It reminded [him]31-sibier too much of [his]31-sibier days with the rebellion , leading [silent troops]1748-silent troops through [the wilderness]1749-the wilderness . Back then , there had been hope in the silence . Now , only dread hung in the air , thick and suffocating . [[His]31-sibier men]1746-his men felt it — [he]31-sibier could see it in [their]1746-his men faces . [Many of [them]1746-his men]1753-many of them believed [they]1746-his men were marching to [their]1746-his men deaths . With trembling fingers , [Sibier]31-sibier unlocked the hinges , easing the door open . The faint creak echoed through the stillness like a warning . [He]31-sibier paused , straining to hear any sound beyond the soft dripping of water from the ceiling . The silence felt alive , pressing against [his]31-sibier ears . Even the faint scuffle of ants in the dirt beside [him]31-sibier sounded unnervingly loud . Chapter Eighteen “ On every coin there are two sides . One is hidden , and the other is shown . ”[560-the captain]

The sound soothed [him]31-sibier , carrying [his]31-sibier stress away like a river dragging silt downstream . [Sibier]31-sibier blinked at the gentle rustle of leaves , the steady rhythm of [his]31-sibier heartbeat in [his]31-sibier ears . Then [he]31-sibier heard it . A quiet sobbing . [Sibier]31-sibier tensed , leaning into the noise . It was n’t far . Rising to [his]31-sibier feet , [he]31-sibier moved lightly , [his]31-sibier steps soft on the damp dirt .

The sobs grew louder as [he]31-sibier pushed through the thicket . Then , [he]31-sibier saw [her]2226-her . Huddled against a gnarled tree was [a girl]2227-a girl — young , maybe seventeen — [her]2226-her fragile frame trembling . Bruises marred [her]2226-her pale skin , and faint scrapes lined [her]2226-her arms like shadows of pain . Goosebumps dotted [her]2226-her freckled flesh , and [her]2226-her teeth chattered as [she]2226-her pulled a torn jacket tightly around [herself]2226-her . It was barely a jacket anymore , just a tattered piece of fabric clinging to [her]2226-her like a dying promise . Tears clung to [her]2226-her glossy green eyes , streaking down [her]2226-her dirt - smeared cheeks . A deep , rattling cough escaped [her]2226-her lips , the sound puffing into the cold night air like smoke . [Sibier]31-sibier froze . Something about [her]2226-her — something in [her]2226-her haunted eyes — reminded [him]31-sibier of [himself]31-sibier . Of the night [he]31-sibier had run from [the High Executioner]384-the high executioner , leaving everything [he]31-sibier loved to burn behind [him]31-sibier . [He]31-sibier crouched down beside [her]2226-her , carefully pulling off [his]31-sibier trenchcoat . The fabric was worn and stained , but it was warm . “ Here , ”[31-sibier] [he]31-sibier said , [his]31-sibier voice soft , “ take this . ”[31-sibier] [The girl]2229-the girl flinched at [his]31-sibier approach , [her]2229-the girl eyes haunted . Chapter Twenty - Eight To [those consigned to the depths]2251-those consigned to the depths , it will be [their]2251-those consigned to the depths mercy

[I]0-i ’ll save [you]2252-you [Trent]31-sibier , but [I]0-i ca n’t until [you]2252-you kill [the High Executioner]384-the high executioner … Those had been [Karia]36-karia ’s last words to [him]31-sibier . Standing on [a rocky shoreline]2254-a rocky shoreline , [Trent]31-sibier stared down at [the restless water]2255-the restless water , [his]31-sibier face blank , save for the shadow in [his]31-sibier eyes . This was one of [the few places in [the kingdom]180-the kingdom]2257-the few places in the kingdom where [the island]402-the island ’s edge still dipped below the waterline , where [the cliffs]2260-the cliffs gave way to something more fragile : stones worn smooth by time , broken and shaped by the tide . It was dangerous here , where [the sea]1042-the sea did n’t just kiss [the land]2262-the land — it devoured [it]2262-the land . [Most people]2263-most people avoided [this place]1304-this place , but that only made it better for [Trent]31-sibier . [He]31-sibier did n’t want [people]415-people . [He]31-sibier wanted to be alone . Alone . [Isolated]18-isolated . At the mercy of [the sea]1042-the sea . [He]31-sibier had stripped away anything that even looked like it belonged to [the High Executioner , anything that carried the scent of death and power]2268-the high executioner , anything that carried the scent of death and power . But as [he]31-sibier stared at the endless horizon , a thought surfaced , unbidden , fragile yet unyielding . Not yet . [He]31-sibier stepped back from [the water]2301-the water , [his]31-sibier movements hesitant , [his]31-sibier breaths shallow . Something kept [him]31-sibier standing , even as [his]31-sibier knees threatened to buckle again . [He]31-sibier had more to do . More to face . A sound fractured the calm . It was n’t the gentle rush of waves against stone , nor the whisper of the wind that usually accompanied [the sea]1042-the sea ’s quiet song . [His]31-sibier eyes narrowed as [he]31-sibier rubbed them in them in disbelief . “ Impossible . ”[31-sibier] Out on [the open ocean]2307-the open ocean , cutting through the waves like a defiant predator , was [a boat]2308-a boat . [A wooden sea craft]2309-a wooden sea craft . [Trent]31-sibier had never seen one before , but the legends resurfaced instantly , gnawing at the edges of [his]31-sibier thoughts . [Men]4339-men could n’t survive [the ocean]406-the ocean . [No one]341-no one survived [the depths]285-the depths . But it was n’t [a man guiding [the boat]2318-the boat]2317-a man guiding the boat . [A figure loomed at the prow]2319-a figure loomed at the prow , its grotesque silhouette framed by the moonlight . Human - like , but wrong . Purple veins pulsed like rivers of poison beneath its flesh , visible even from this distance . [Trent]31-sibier ’s stomach turned . [He]31-sibier could n’t look away . [The thing]2320-the thing stood upright , confident , tugging a strange cover over [the boat]2318-the boat like it was sheathing the vessel itself . [The craft]2322-the craft plunged into a wave and vanished beneath the surface . For a moment , [Trent]31-sibier thought it was gone . But then it burst back into view , breaking free of the water . [The boat]2318-the boat climbed the waves , shattering their crests with a power that felt unnatural . And [the figure]676-the figure remained steady , its movements eerily precise as it manipulated [the boat]2318-the boat with a calculated efficiency . [Trent]31-sibier blinked , feeling [his]31-sibier throat go dry . That skin . [He]31-sibier knew what it was . [Sibier]31-sibier . The thought struck like a thunderclap . [Sibier]31-sibier ’s cursed arm had the same charred texture , the same glowing veins . But this ... this was different . [Trent]31-sibier frowned when [Sibier]31-sibier pumped [his]31-sibier fist into the air , letting it crackle with power . [ end of scene mark[ce ] ] _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ [Selean]35-selean Carries [Trent Chapter Twenty[cf][cg]-Four

Chapter Twenty - Six “ [Whe[cn][co]n men]4891-whe[cn][co]n men are learned [they]4891-whe[cn][co]n men will think that [their]4891-whe[cn][co]n men light will outshine the Stars ”[31-sibier]

[Trent]31-sibier stood ready . The High Executioner coat felt heavy around [his]31-sibier shoulders as stood silently on [a nearby tower]2831-a nearby tower , overlooking [the storage center]2832-the storage center . The sun was setting , casting a dying glow across [the castle ’s courtyard]2833-the castle ’s courtyard . [The Darkened Dawn]984-the darkened dawn would attack today -- that is , if [they]2835-they had any decent strategic mind . The payment of this tribute was this week . 1 . NEW SCENE : [Trent]31-sibier as [Emperor]2933-emperor . 1 . Scene Progression : Talk about how [his]31-sibier food distribution and removal and strict kingdom laws is causing increased riots , and great unrest . [Groups]123-groups question [Trent]31-sibier ’s authority and ability to protect [them]123-groups from [the DD]124-the dd , [the most influential one led by [[Karia]36-karia ’s Father]2935-karia ’s father]2934-the most influential one led by karia ’s father -- which is preventing the success of [Trent]31-sibier ’s reforms . [Trent]31-sibier heads to the riot , and publicly executes [[her]36-karia father]4210-her father ( also in an act of revenge ) . 2 . Goal : Show the stress on [Trent]31-sibier , and highlight how [he]31-sibier feels stuck and desperately wanting [Karia]36-karia by [her]36-karia side . Also highlight the growing tension in [the kingdom]180-the kingdom

Unfaltering Chapter Thirty - six

[People]415-people blurred by [Sibier]31-sibier as [he]31-sibier squeezed to the side , pushing against the tide . Something was coming , and [he]31-sibier would stand in between it and [[his]31-sibier people]318-his people . Nothing was getting to [Ilyian]46-ilyian . [He]31-sibier set fire . _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Heavens Aligned Chapter Thirty - Seven

The fire caught with the brilliance of a star . [Sibier]31-sibier spun around , [his]31-sibier breathing rapid . [He]31-sibier had to keep the flame alive . [He]31-sibier had to make sure all the food burned . For [the community]1060-the community . For [[his]31-sibier parents]503-his parents . For [Ilyian]46-ilyian . [He]31-sibier just had to make sure all the food burned . Not much longer . Burning skies , not much longer ! Heavens above , it was all going to be over soon one way or another . [The heti]3402-the heti spun , knocking [Trent]31-sibier off of [his]31-sibier heels . [The m[db]onster]144-the m[db]onster 's gaze snapped over to [him]31-sibier , [its]144-the m[db]onster icy eyes landing directly on [Sibier]31-sibier . Suddenly , [his]31-sibier soul chilled , a shiver creeping down [his]31-sibier spine . Its coldness froze [him]31-sibier . How could [he]31-sibier beat that ? Survive Chapter Thirty - Nine

[He]31-sibier . Had . To . Survive . [Sibier]31-sibier gasped for breath , shambling through [a rotten graveyard]3574-a rotten graveyard . [The monster]4617-the monster was slaughtering [everyone]307-everyone . [He]31-sibier closed [his]31-sibier eyes , trying to pry the images from [his]31-sibier mind . Flesh tearing , guts ripping , eyes popping … was that how [Gilit]150-gilit had been ? [Skies]33-skies . It was a miracle [he]31-sibier escaped with only a gash to [his]31-sibier stomach . Thank the stars . Coughing blood , [he]31-sibier squinted , pleading for the pain to go away . It would be so easy to lie down , to give up . To die . But [he]31-sibier could n’t . [He]31-sibier needed to make sure [Ilyian]46-ilyian was safe . [He]31-sibier needed to make sure [[his]31-sibier community]2802-his community was ok . [He]31-sibier needed to survive . Rubbing [his]31-sibier eyes free of sweat , [he]31-sibier focused on the jostling figures near [the edge of [the island]402-the island]2386-the edge of the island . Fierce winds blasted against [them]3581-they as [they]3581-they huddled , crossing [the small bridge]3582-the small bridge as fast as [they]3581-they could . [Sibier]31-sibier swallowed blood . With a storm like this — billowing winds , consuming fog , and pounding rain — the task would be near impossible . It would take time . Lots of it . Hopefully enough to have [Sibier]31-sibier catch up . And take [Ilyian]46-ilyian across [the bridge]3583-the bridge with [him]31-sibier . [He]31-sibier winced , grabbing [his]31-sibier side . [He]31-sibier pulled away [his]31-sibier hand , stained red . [Skies]33-skies , there was a lot of blood . Help [me]0-i . Please . [He]31-sibier closed [his]31-sibier eyes , shunning the nightmares out of [his]31-sibier mind . [He]31-sibier could n’t unsee [the heti]3402-the heti ’s blackened fingernails tear apart [Ilyian]46-ilyian . Its threats still echoed through [him]31-sibier , repeating like [an annoying eight - year old]3585-an annoying eight - year old . [Sibier]31-sibier wailed . That wo n’t happen . [I]0-i wo n’t let it happen . Nothing will happen to [Ilyian]46-ilyian . Nothing will touch [him]46-ilyian , please , please ! Panic corroded at [his]31-sibier bones , as [he]31-sibier took the next step . Then the next . Every footfall pounded in [his]31-sibier chest , burning away at [his]31-sibier body . [He]31-sibier throbbed . All of [him]31-sibier . [I]0-i will make it . [I]0-i have to . [I]0-i have to survive . Still , [the heti]3402-the heti ’s threat loomed like a thundercloud , its threat heavy and cold . Darker than the tendrils of fog swirling around [him]31-sibier , nearly snaring [him]31-sibier with chilly tangibility . How was [he]31-sibier going to stop [the heti]3402-the heti ? How were any of [them]3592-they going to stop [the heti]3402-the heti ? Trent]160-trent . [My]0-i blasted name is [Trent]160-trent . [The High Executioner]384-the high executioner squinted [his]384-the high executioner eyes , blocking out any feeling . Remorse . [I]0-i do n’t need remorse . But it splintered [his]0-i shield of anger , crawling into [his]0-i heart . [He]0-i could n’t watch [[his]0-i sister]256-his sister hug [a dying hero]3835-a dying hero without feeling remorse . Especially when [he]0-i had once been [the hero]981-the hero dying . [He]160-trent let it fall to the ground . [He]160-trent remembered [Karia]36-karia ’s arms wrapped around [him]160-trent as [he]160-trent struggled to stay awake . “ [Sister]161-sister , would [he]31-sibier be proud ? ”[35-selean] [Selean]35-selean caught [Ilyian]46-ilyian ’s gaze , meeting the nineteen year old dear eyes . “ Yes , ”[35-selean] [she]35-selean ruefully remembered . “ [Sibier]31-sibier ’s pride shines down from the stars . ”[35-selean] [Ilyian]46-ilyian gave a short nod , pulling the single black glove tighter around [his]46-ilyian hand .
